portfolio.title: French Learning App
portfolio.purpose: To help people studying French learn the different conjugation forms of most common French words.
features: Let's users practice French verb forms with flashcards and tests
Users can create an account and bookmark difficult words
List of all the forms for each verb
Users can change their email address, password or delete their account under settings
Password reset system for users who forget their login

portfolio.title: Asteroid Tracker
portfolio.stack: Node, Express for backend, Vanilla JavaScript, CSS and HTML for frontend
portfolio.purpose: See how many Nearth Earth Objects (NEOs) are orbiting the Earth.
features: Let's users check the number of NEOs for a specified day
Provides more information about the NEO, e.g. size, speed and whether it is potentially dangerous
Custom error message illustrations, e.g. if there are no NEOs or user input incorrect date format

about.title: Interactive CSS background animation
about.description: Using HTML and CSS, in this video I show how to create an interactive background when the user hovers over the area. To achieve this, I use CSS animations, including the properties 'animation-play-state', 'animation-fill-mode' and 'animation-timing-function'.

about.title: Glassmorphism tutorial
about.description: This video shoes how to create the Frosted Glass effect, also known as Glassmorphism, with CSS.

about.title: Create Animated Underlines with the Intersection Observer API
about.description: Animations are a great way to enhance your website. In this video, I explain how to use the JavaScript Intersection API to add animated underlines to your website when the user scrolls down the page.

about.title: Transitioning CSS gradients
about.description: You can create gradients easily with the background-image: linear-gradient() property. This can however not be transitioned. This tutorial explains how you can nonetheless create buttons and links that have a transitioning gradient.

React.js: React: Creating and Hosting a Full-Stack Website
Node & Express: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
PHP: PHP: Accessing Databases with PDO and MySQLi
Ajax and PHP: Add Dynamic Content to Websites
PHP: Clean URLs on Apache Server
